name: Pop Faces Mania
description:
Pop Faces: Once you pop, you can't stop!
Pop Faces is a game where you must select a color group of emojis on a grid and click to destroy them.
Tap on two or more adjacent stars to destroy them.
The more stars you destroy with a single click, the higher your score will be.
Pop Faces involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
